name: LEDOG (DOG)
description: Godel is an innovative project that bridges the gap between the Bitcoin and Ethereum ecosystems, opening up new possibilities for Bitcoin users. By implementing the Bitcoin address format on an EVM-compatible layer-2 chain, Godel provides a seamless experience for BTC users to access smart contracts, faster transactions, shorter confirmation times, and lower fees. Smart Contract Functionality Godel's Layer 2 solution alleviates congestion caused by BRC-20 tokens, ensuring smoother transactions and a more efficient ecosystem.
